text: Wayne Rooney has just announced his
retirement from international football
the Everton striker is England's

this is actually quite shocked news
actually we've received within the last

since November a friendly against

against Scotland and France so perhaps
you could say the writing was on the
wall then but having moved from

first two games and Gareth Southgate the
England manager was planning to recall
